title: President Donald J. Trump is Giving Small Businesses a Boost â€“ The White House
content:
Fact Sheets			

		Economy & Jobs	

Issued on:
November 29, 2017
Together we are unleashing a new era of American prosperity, perhaps likes we have never seen before.
						President Donald J. Trump					SMALL BUSINESSES ARE CRITICAL TO THE ECONOMY: Small businesses are a primary driver of the American economy and when they succeed so does the country.TAX REFORM FOR SMALL BUSINESSES: The tax reform plans in the House and Senate would cuts taxes for small businesses.HIGHER GROWTH, HIGHER WAGES, AND MORE JOBS: The tax reform bills in the House and Senate will increase investment in the American economy, leading to higher growth, increased wages, and more jobs for hardworking Americans.REMOVING THE BURDEN ON SMALL BUSINESSES: President Trump has already taken action to remove the regulatory burdens all businesses face, particularly small businesses.
